price: When he came to it, he was called, “Blessed is He Who is at the fire and those who are around it[3]. Glory be to Allah, the Lord of the worlds.
arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَهَا نُودِيَ أَنۢ بُورِكَ مَن فِي ٱلنَّارِ وَمَنۡ حَوۡلَهَا وَسُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
footnotes: [3] i.e., the angels around the fire.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center

meta.transliteration: falammā jāahā nūdiya an būrika man fī al-nāri waman ḥawlahā wasub'ḥāna al-lahi rabbi al-ʿālamīna
